old_value:
因為你選擇嘅數據包有問題，所以無法載入世界。
你可以嘗試只用原版嘅數據包（「安全模式」），或者返去主畫面自己修復。
old_en_us:
Errors in currently selected datapacks prevented the world from loading.
You can either try to load it with only the vanilla data pack ("safe mode"), or go back to the title screen and fix it manually.
new_value:
你選擇的數據包有問題，導致無法載入世界。
你可以嘗試只載入原版數據包（「安全模式」），或者返回主畫面手動修復。
new_en_us:
Errors in currently selected data packs prevented the world from loading.
You can either try to load it with only the vanilla data pack ("safe mode"), or go back to the title screen and fix it manually.

old_value:
第三方伺服器可能會傳送非標準格式嘅聊天訊息。
啟用依個選項後，將會根據發言者嘅名稱嚟隱藏玩家。
old_en_us:
3rd-party Servers may send chat messages in non-standard formats.
With this option on: hidden players will be matched based on chat sender names.
new_value:
第三方伺服器可能會傳送非標準格式的聊天訊息。
啟用此選項後，將會根據發言者的名稱而隱藏玩家。
new_en_us:
3rd-party Servers may send chat messages in non-standard formats.
With this option on, hidden players will be matched based on chat sender names.

old_value: 依個世界最後喺 %s 版本遊玩，而你依家玩緊嘅係 %s 版本。降低世界嘅遊戲版本可能會導致存檔損壞，我哋唔肯定個世界會唔會崩潰或 load 唔 load 得到。如果你依然想繼續，唔該先備份依個存檔！
old_en_us: This world was last played in version %s; you are on version %s. Downgrading a world could cause corruption - we cannot guarantee that it will load or work. If you still want to continue, please make a backup!
new_value: 此世界最後於 %s 版本遊玩，而你目前遊玩 %s 版本。降低世界的遊戲版本可能會導致存檔損壞，我們無法確定世界是否會崩潰或是否可以載入。若你想繼續，請先備份存檔。
new_en_us: This world was last played in version %s; you are on version %s. Downgrading a world could cause corruption - we cannot guarantee that it will load or work. If you still want to continue, please make a backup.

old_value: 此世界最後遊玩版本為 %s，你當前版本為 %s。請先備份以避免世界損壞！
old_en_us: This world was last played in version %s; you are on version %s. Please make a backup in case you experience world corruptions!
new_value: 此世界最後於 %s 版本遊玩，而你目前遊玩 %s 版本。請先備份以避免世界損壞。
new_en_us: This world was last played in version %s; you are on version %s. Please make a backup in case you experience world corruptions.
